csv-edit.beforeCommentsAppearance.description: the appearance of the before comments section if it is not displayed initially you can still display it manually
enumDescriptions: always visible
always visible but expanded
displayed if we have before comments
displayed if we have before comments but expanded
never displayed but comments are still exported (we use write options to decide this)

csv-edit.afterCommentsAppearance.description: the appearance of the after comments section if it is not displayed initially you can still display it manually
enumDescriptions: always visible
always visible but expanded
displayed if we have after comments
displayed if we have after comments but expanded
never displayed but comments are still exported (we use write options to decide this)

csv-edit.readOptionsAppearance.description: the appearance of the read option section
enumDescriptions: read options will always start expanded
read options will always start collapsed
read options will use the last state (across all edit session, we use the latest)

csv-edit.writeOptionsAppearance.description: the appearance of the write option section
enumDescriptions: write options will always start expanded
write options will always start collapsed
write options will use the last state (across all edit session, we use the latest)

csv-edit.previewOptionsAppearance.description: the appearance of the preview section
enumDescriptions: preview section will always start expanded
preview section will always start collapsed
preview section will use the last state (across all edit session, we use the latest)

csv-edit.readOption_hasHeader.description: whether the first data line is a header line
enumDescriptions: first row is the header row
first row is a normal data row

csv-edit.readOption_delimiter.description: the delimiter to use, empty string to auto detect

csv-edit.readOption_comment.description: the string used as comment, empty string to thread every line as data line (no comments)

csv-edit.writeOption_hasHeader.description: whether the first data line is a header line
enumDescriptions: first row is the header row
first row is a normal data row

csv-edit.writeOption_delimiter.description: the delimiter to use, empty string to auto detect

csv-edit.writeOption_comment.description: the string used as comment, empty string to exclude comments
